DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if one drug is superior to another with regard to safety and the preservation of renal function after a kidney transplant.
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Sirolimus With Cyclosporine in a Calcineurin Inhibitor (CNI)-Free Regimen in Kidney Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Dialysis patients who will be receiving their first kidney transplant Weight over 88 pounds (lbs.) Very high cholesterol levels Obesity Organ donor over 65 years of age if living; over 60 years of age if cadaveric.
